items.summary: Ensure the customer-facing Shop collection page ("Our Collection" in frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx) displays all 20 products by default whenever the catalog contains 20 items (from backend listProducts or from the frontend fallback sampleProducts).

Update the product-list fetching logic in frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts so that it never results in fewer than 20 displayed products due solely to actor initialization/query enablement; if the backend returns fewer than 20 products (or returns an empty array unexpectedly), merge/fallback to the 20-item sampleProducts list so the Shop collection view still shows all 20 items.
